website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful lamp and Bluetooth speaker combo that looks as good as it sounds. Great for parties, special events, and mood lighting set to your favorite music.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for the lamp design with LED lighting that flickers like a candle
Syncs easily to your favorite smart device with range of about 30 feet
Looks great in the dark, and makes a nice table centerpiece or bedside lamp
cons: Volume doesn't go extremely loud, and sound lacks bass
A few reports of short battery life per charge

customer_reviews.title: Slick!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is pretty slick. Mine was flickering handsomely as I opened the box. Very simple set up. Very attractive. Very impressive sound. Excellent addition to one of our patios; getting more for others. Just a note that it does not come with a stand—it doesn’t necessarily need one, but if in any kind of unstable setting, you’ll want to order that separately.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is great! It sounds good and the flickering flame is pleasant. I actually bought a second speaker and yes, you can bluetooth sync both of them to one device. The speakers actually sync to each other (turn them both on and they'll find each other when the top is flashing) you'll only see one connection when you connect the bluetooth to your device but sound comes from both speakers!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nights out on the deck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for evenings out on our deck. It sits on 2 person table. The speaker doesn't take up much room, about the same as a mason jar sized candle. The glow it makes is plenty of light to see the table top for drinks. The flame flicker goes perfectly with our tiki torches. The sound quality is great and the speaker can get way louder than we need it to. After a week of use I am VERY happy with this purchase. It is perfect for our space.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised with good sound. I like them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these DIKAOU Led flame speaker-lights. Once they arrived, I charged them both well, indicated by a light/color. These look good and work very well, paired easily, and the sound quality from a small speaker is surprisingly good. (No, it is not an expensive, high-end sound that's loaded with bass, but is quite good. The type of music, or recording, can make a difference in the sound, too.) I have not used these for very long; so, battery life is difficult to judge. But, I'm pleased with the performance and look, and would buy them again. (I bought these to use at a garden party this summer. Note they are not fully waterproof.)
customer_reviews.author: Arron

customer_reviews.title: These are really awesome. We bought 4 of them and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome. We bought 4 of them and they are the perfect size for the side tables on our lanai. The flicking flame is surprisingly lifelike and, combined with our fire pit, create a perfect evening outdoor mood. You can only sync one of them to your bluetooth but the sound quality and volume are excellent. I hope they can find a way someday to sync multiples but, in the meantime, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hearne

customer_reviews.title: Big sound in a small size
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived, I was kind of thrown off because it was smaller than I expected. But man, it sure does sound great. The flame light on it is really cool looking. The signal connection on it is very strong. Definitely an excellent buy for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Compact Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I received this last night and it only took 1 day to arrive! The led flame was on as soon as I opened the box. I brought it out to the pool and turned it on. All features worked as described and the sound was very good. Its small & light and looks and feels like its built well. The icing on this cake is the led flame light! When my friends arrived I had it playing and within an hour one of my friends ordered one. I will probably order another one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: A fun option to take your music outside.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product for outdoors or to use as a night light for kids when you are on vacation (and they sleep with music playing). The speaker quality is average and what you would expect from a small, single speaker. I think it is missing some of the deeper sound that you appreciate when listening to music, but I don't think many people would use a speaker like this to critique the quality of music anyway. The speakers are mountable on a tripod or post as they have a threaded receiver on the bottom. It would be neat if you could network several of these together.
customer_reviews.author: DSLong

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SPEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM!!!! If you're looking for a speaker that packs a punch this may not be for you but for our needs they're perfect. Great background tunes for parties and such. I love that they don't over power the party AND the flames are awesome!! Great looking speakers too, high quality. Only pair one then let the second pair with the first speaker... that easy! Get the 4ft tiki torch and you're golden!
customer_reviews.author: SydneyKate

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this speaker. The sound is good (not a Bose, of course). No complaints. Item worked perfectly out of the box. The candle-like light is icing on the cake. I use it on the patio, out in the yard, as well as in the house. My sister liked it so much that she ordered two for herself. Great communication from seller after purchase. I will be ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: A beagle named Fred

customer_reviews.title: Omg
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible!! Bought 2 of them .sync together great ! For the size the sound is fantastic and the flickering is so cool!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No flame
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work. The music will play but there is no flame.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Love the lantern look. I’m very happy with this sound quality and volume. It adds such a nice touch to our backyard.. can’t wait for our first night around the fire with friends so we can really use this!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Darmiento

customer_reviews.title: I Bought Two and Paired Them.  It Works and I Love The Sound!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I only bought one. Once charged up fully, I tested the sound and LED flame. The sound is pure and epic via a bluetooth to my Galaxy Note 9. So, I bought a second one, charged it up fully, watched the video in the ad and followed the directions. Poof, the speakers paired and I love the sound! When it warms up, I am taking these to the beach at night. 5 stars and highly recommended. By the way, I did do some research on others before I made this purchase and this one seemed like the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Frucci

customer_reviews.title: Charming ambiance and decent sounding speaker for its size.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: wonderful ambiance from the imitation flame - speaker sound good for this size unit - very simple to operate and charge - excellent and quick response from the manufacturer - compact, portable, and easy to take on a camping trip or vacation. Cons: Not atpX compatible, meaning that if there is a significant delay between the playing devices' sound and this unit - once the unit it turned back on it looses its Bluetooth connection, so you have to move the speaker very close to the source/transmitter to reconnect then you can move it back to the desired listening position (our experience no more than 12ft with walls/windows/floors, 20ft within sight).
customer_reviews.author: Kassey

customer_reviews.title: very compact easy to use, but still packs a good sound.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my friend had one of these and I loved it so much I had to buy one. It's so cool, the flames and then music playing with it, amazing. I wish that the flame went with the beat of the music but it doesn't. This doesn't change anything though, it's a nice item to have sitting outside listening to some music and enjoying the evening. I would recommend this item to anyone. It's great to have for outdoor bbq's, family gatherings, just about anything outdoors this can be used for. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth no longer working after two months
customer_reviews.text: Loves this device when I first received it. Syncing to my phone was easy and the light is really nice. After a couple of months and maybe 8 total uses the Bluetooth function is not working. Very disappointed in the failure of this product. Stick with a better know brand
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Cool little lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a flame lamp I got simply because I thought it looked really cool. I was pretty surprised when I hooked it up to my phone and heard the quality of sound this little thing reproduces. They seem very solid and are great for a deck. The "fire" lamp is a nice added feature for the evening time. I read a question on how to pair 2 speakers, turn off the Bluetooth on your device, turn on both speakers, then turn your Bluetooth back on to pair. They both hooked up beautifully. I highly recommend it if you are looking for some speakers for both ambiance and background music.
customer_reviews.author: Minh

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers when two are synced and volume adjusted!
customer_reviews.text: The look and sound of these small portable speakers is perfect for outdoors. The flame effect is lovely at night. The biggest problem I had was syncing two speakers to a single device. It’s possible but most of the instructions on YouTube are worthless or unintelligible. Finally figured it out by reading an Amazon review. The key is only syncing a Single speaker to your device THEN turning it off. Next you turn on both speakers and both speakers should sync to each other. It took me a couple times but it worked. Also if speaker sound is too low even at its highest level, volume needs to be adjusted on the device it’s synced to. Love these cute speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Y.

customer_reviews.title: DiKaou  Flame Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased just one of these speakers but after receiving it an listening to the sound and the workmanship in the speaker my wife had me order a second. Love the way they look and sound plus the flame lightening effect is outstanding. Highly recommend this speaker. Also wanted to add that I had trouble connecting the speakers to get them to sync and sent an email to the company and had a reply the next morning. Information provided enabled me to sync the two speakers together and took only about 2 mins. Great response time
customer_reviews.author: michael shannon

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a great little speaker but I was wrong. First, the only nice thing is the light. Looks like a flickering flame and is nice sitting outside at night. To bad that is it. The sound can only be heard if you are sitting within 10 feet. After that, nope. It will not stay connected to my phone or my wife's phone. Tried all different settings that were recommended, nope. I went back to my old $15 dollar one I have in the garage. Sound and connectivity are outstanding, just doesn't have the range of this one for Bluetooth. Save your cash.
customer_reviews.author: gysM715

customer_reviews.title: DIKAOU Led flame table lamp, Torch atmosphere Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Unbelievably long battery life, longest in a Blue Tooth speaker I've encountered. Really cool flame feature. Threaded pole mount on bottom. Overall construction is solid, decent unit. Cons: Difficult to pair until you understand that these devices seem to only be able to pair to one phone at a time. If you want to pair to another phone you have to disconnect the original pair. That was frustrating. I wish the sound was a little stronger on the bass side. Pairing two together also can be a chore. Once you get the pairing down, they're pretty decent unique speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T. Martello

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: My old faithful Big Jambox is in its dotage, so I picked this one up on a lightning deal. It paired with my laptop easily. I'm now streaming an EDM concert, and I'm extremely surprised at how well it plays both the extreme highs and lows of EDM. Volume is great, too. No lie, it compares favorably to the Jambox, which was pretty dang pricy. I picked up a second one at the regular price, and the two synced up nicely; it wasn't clear from the instructions how to do that, but I watched a YouTube video and got it done.
customer_reviews.author: tatcol

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, great ambience.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love this speaker. The light is awesome. I wish you could adjust the flickering frequency to make a tad slower, but it gives off a great ambience. Connects well to my phone. Volume could be louder. It does give off good music volume, but when playing moves or videos thr max vol is more like med vol. You have to press and hold the + - buttons to adjust the volume, BC the buttons are also to skip forward or backward song choice, which is annoying when you forget. Wish it was a little larger as well. Overall love and my friends loved it, but wish it was lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fall in love with me you will love these speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with the speakers!!! I bought 2 & followed the review instructions on how to pair them took me a couple of tries & I would not have bought 2 it it had not been for the review about it pairing them. They look amazing!! Last for hours!! Good for indoors & outdoors. Great bass sound is crisp & listen to a lot of older music that has not been remasters & they do not disappoint. Plays well with just one but two is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality Is Awful
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and spend the money and buy a Sonos at Best Buy or on Amazon. The sound quality on this is awful and crackly. The only cool thing is it flickers...but you can go buy flickering battery operated candles for that effect. We bought a Sonos a month ago and it's absolutely amazing....pricey...around $160, but powerful and you can get it with Alexa or without.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Flaming Music!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for us! We needed it for our outdoor patio to provide light. It is visually appealing and does an excellent job providing light and great sound. We usually use our Smart speaker for our outdoor music but the benefit of this is that there is no cord or power required. For a music source so far we have used our iPod but since we just got it last week, haven't had time to play with it and discover all of the possibilities! Update! I learned how to sync it with Alexa so now we have even more options for music!
customer_reviews.author: MB!

customer_reviews.title: Great little item!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is so cool! Yes it’s small so it’s not going to totally rock your world but the sound is clear and certainly sufficient for relaxing on the deck or around the fire pit. The flame effect is really neat (no idea how you would “sync” multiples to use as pathway lights). I’ve only charged it once since I got it over a month ago but I think that may be because I haven’t used the “flame” a lot yet mostly using it in daylight. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase. This Bluetooth speaker is awesome. I was able to pair it to my phone in literally only four seconds. The sound is incredible; it fills up the entire room! There is absolutely no distortion even if I turn up the volume all the way up. This is definitely high-end tech speaker system. I love that it has really good bass too. The flame light looks so cool! My girlfriend loves it too; she has had the light on every evening since I purchased it. The battery lasts a super long time even when listening to music at high volume and the flame light on. I recommend this BT speaker flame light to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these guys! The light is quite realistic at night. They do sync together if they are both turned on at the same time. We do sometimes have trouble connecting our IPhones, but all in all pretty happy. Didn’t charge them up when we first received them and they played about 5 hours before we had to recharge them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Furze

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the deck parties / BBQs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they paired together vary easily. They do not have the best sound, (ie, some, but not a lot of bass) but I use them for ambient "stereo" music during BBQs or parties on the backyard deck. We do not play them too loud as it would over power conversations. If you prefer louder music with more bass backing and expect people to dance, you will want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Really Great - With One Hitch
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous and well made. The flame flicker is immensely realistic and soothing. The sound quality is wonderful. There was only two hiccups. In the instructions there weren't clear directions how to pair two (we have two) and I had to search online for a video. The second is there is about 2-3 second lag in the sound from the video being played on my phone. I haven't figured out how to correct for this, or why it is happening. But if you're going to just be listening to music, they are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyBR

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, not much volume in mid/low range.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good quality, there’s just not enough of it. It’s a 5 watt speaker. The higher frequencies come out louder. Speaking and bass frequencies are too weak. Does have a nice full room effect, just a small room, and only when there are no competing sounds, like air conditioner, fans, washer/dryer/dishwasher. Maybe getting two would help the situation? The flickering light is not like natural flames at all. It’s like a fire on cocaine. If you don’t look right at it, it might be fine. So, I’m going to keep this one. Get a second later, put them in my patio, to see what difference they make together. Maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Bushong

customer_reviews.title: Connects to alexa and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: The sound cuts outs sometimes. To connect to alexa, go into your alexa app, select your dot, choose pair a new device and they will connect. If the speaker is flashing blue, it’s searching. When it connects it will be a steady light. I had to turn off my phones Bluetooth and unplug my other alexa device because it was confused. But after that, it connected.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Decent speaker, not HiFi, but works for what we need - background music while sitting out on our back deck/pool area. Not overly loud, so if you want to blast your tunes this isn’t the speaker for you. The lights are nice - give some ambiance when sitting at our outdoor table most nights. Bluetooth pairing took about 5 seconds with my iPhone. Easy-Peasy. The light on top is red while charging, but goes out when battery is full. Don’t know how long it lasts on a charge, but I used the speaker for about 4 hours without any issues. Will buy another to pair to iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Devane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and perfect for romantic setup
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a romantic setup especially when I am having dates over in my place for dinner. The LED lighting gives a candle like effect and it’s just so perfect. The sound is clear and you can make out every word being said in a movie and even in song lyrics. Since I usually use it to create ambience for dinner and to vibe, I have found it to be a perfect speakers for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jebin Joshua Moses

customer_reviews.title: My early Christmas present!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable speaker sooo much!! It glows beautifully and is so easy to use. It was already charged when I opened it so I used the Bluetooth on my phone and began to play my music immediately! It was that simple! I used it in my bathroom to hear a podcast as I took a shower and I used it to hear a sermon before going to bed. The dancing fire light is so calming and relaxing and I love the sound quality and the amount of volume it has. I’m so pleased with this hidden gem.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor and indoor use! Good value and sound!
customer_reviews.text: The "campfire light" aspect is really only good from standing far away, up close it looks like a bunch of randing orange circle lights. The sound is good, i think it is nice for the price. It could use a little more bass though. It is easy to connect to a phone, the battery is really long lasting. The buttons are however a little confusing, the "+" and "-" button instead of being volume, they are next song and back. The only volume control is from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Light won’t dim
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these lights from Amazon the last three that I’ve ordered you cannot dim the light does anybody else have this problem all my others you’re able to touch the top button three times and then will go off but in the meantime it’s not giving different levels of brightness with the flame I really really like this the sound is great the Bluetooth on it everything is just perfect but the last few that I have that you cannot dim the light other than that it works great let me know if anybody out there Has the same trouble
customer_reviews.author: Scraps

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great company
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Dikaou speaker. I could not figure out how to pair the speaker with my phone. Also, I had a question about the stand. When I inquired about this, Angel (the company representative) responded very quickly and answered my questions and also upgraded my order. I am very happy with the quality of the product, and impressed with the concerns Angel had with my questions. I would recommend The Dikaou speaker very highly. Great company to do business with!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Patrick Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Expected a little more
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected the speakers/base to sound better. If you're just wanting a speaker it's fine so I am only deducting 1 star, but I was trying to replace my speaker that had a really nice base to it. The flame is fine, someone commented that it doesn't look like flames... if you are looking directly at it then sure, it's a pattern of lights - but the light it gives off against other surfaces looks good.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is pretty awesome. I initially used this outside while my baby and i waited to see if we could catch the comet but it was attracting mosquitoes. So i made a fort in the house and used it as a lantern music box. My baby absolutely loved it. Audio was crisp. No static or noise. Sounds and looks great. I plan on buying more in the near future for outdoor gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't do reviews very often but I feel like these are deserving. I purchased 2 of the LED flame speakers and am incredibly happy with their performance so far! I wasn't sure if they would sync together, but after following the directions posted by another review, they indeed did sync. They are beautiful to look at and the sound quality is great for the price! I am an extremely happy customer and would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for more than just a wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth speakers really surprised me with their quality. I didn’t have high expectations, but these speakers proved me wrong. They have good volume, bass, and are surprisingly easy to pair and connect to my iPhone. I got 2 and they automatically paired with each other after they were turned on. Then connected quickly to my phone. The battery life is more than I expected as well. I bought them to use on the deck, I only charge them once a week and use them almost every evening. So you won’t be disappointed with the quality of these speakers, the lights are also a plus!
customer_reviews.author: V. K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I read people had trouble getting a pair of speakers to go stereo. The trick is to turn off your Bluetooth on your device. Push the seek button on the speakers at the same time and then turn on your Bluetooth on your device. Then you will have stereo coming out of your speakers. I didn’t think the sound would be all that good considering the size of the speakers. It was better than I expected. A good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: G. B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful speaker that also sound great
customer_reviews.text: The led lights really surprised me. When it is used at night, we like to turn the led lights on and it gives out a very good ambient lighting as if you lighted a candle. The sound of the speaker is also surprisingly good for its size. With this speaker, I no longer need to blast music from my phone speakers. There is one thing that I wish it is different. Its + - button is programmed to skip songs on single pressed and volume up down on long pressed. I wish it is the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Feel good value purchase of the year! But then it malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.text: LED candle looks nice. Sound quality is great for a tiny speaker. Bluetooth works perfect. It’s amazingly light weight. I find myself carrying it with me around the house and even on my ATV. My new best friend. Love it!!!!!!! (Update 9/19/2019) Unit is malfunctioning. Reduced review by two stars. The red light that’s supposed to come on red when charging and turn the off when fully charged now never comes on so you have to way to determine battery charge condition.
customer_reviews.author: Biff E Waters

customer_reviews.title: Flaming sound
customer_reviews.text: The flame effect is more like small lights that follow a pattern, but as long as you’re not looking at it, it provides a nice candle light appearance. I use this with my phone, so I am able to control the volume with my phone. I leave this plugged in, so I can’t review battery life. The only issue I have is that the audio delay from the Bluetooth speaker to my phone. I’ve tried many things, but there is always a delay when watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive light
customer_reviews.text: 1 week after the return window closed it stopped working. The flame is still functioning but the speaker won't stay on. The battery is charged, but it won't stay on long enough to connect to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for the cost. You're note buying a Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why so many complaints, good little speaker for the price. Only had it a few hours, but it plays fine. And the light is cool. Seems to drain the battery fast with the light on. An it says right in the book, NOT TO USE IN THE RAIN. So to the people who said it was water proof, nope, don't even try. Can't wait to get a second and see if they pair.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I had bought this product before and it worked fine. This one I gave as a gift at Christmas to be used during the summer at pool parties. Unfortunately the time to return it has passed. When we connected it this week, it would not connect to bluetooth so it's useless. The window to return it has long passed. Be sure you check this out immediately Some of them do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the patio!
customer_reviews.text: I have this setup for the patio outside, it provides just the right amount of light for mood lighting and the speakers are decent enough for background noise. If you're looking for high fidelity, I highly doubt you'll want a bluetooth speaker. So keep your expectations at a moderate level and its an excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Thaeyo

customer_reviews.title: Cool Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good for such a small speaker. I don’t have to play them as loud as they will go. I’m using them outside right now on my patio & the flaming torch lights make for a nice atmosphere. I bought a pair of them so it’s nice to place them in different locations. I like that they have a threaded bottom so I can bolt them to my mesh tables so I don’t have to worry about them getting knocked off the table by accident or a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straight A product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is straight forward... UX for physical controls, easy Bluetooth connection, and surprisingly loud speaker... haven't tried pairing more speakers, but I don't think you'd need it. This is designed for table top, dinner setting in small backyard - so it's really for 'background' music situation. I wish you can either dim the light - or wish it's little dimmer.... bit too bright for my taste.... otherwise very cool!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker, But the Lighting is What Will Get Ya!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a white elephant gift and my parents ended up picking it. So I got to enjoy its use. This baby is like any decent affordable Bluetooth speaker, but the lighting is wonderful. If you turn off all of the lights in your house and only have the "fire ambiance" function running, it is like a mini fireplace or an extremely radiant candle. I believe one time I went over to watch a movie we only used the speaker for lighting while we watched a movie. It is a great speaker as well. I plan to buy one for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Master Paku

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had an outdoor wedding in October. We purchased these two speakers to use for the wedding music and to remain playing through the reception. Afterwards we took them home to place them by the pool for music when we are outdoors entertaining. They are great speakers and the flame accent is just fun. The signal from my Ipad to the speakers was about 10 feet before they started to be a little fuzzy. If you want something inexpensive to go around the pool or on the back patio these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cays

customer_reviews.title: It’s not very good at pretending to be a flame.
customer_reviews.text: Wow is the “flame” fake looking. More like a timed blinking Christmas tree. Too bad cuz the orange/yellow color is nice. The size is right. The exterior is fine. But. I’m trying to think of anything less restful than sitting on the back deck in the evening with this thing blinking like a road hazard light.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Unique bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I love this speaker. The flame effect is very appealing and I receive many compliments on it. However, the volume is very low and that's with my MP3 player at its maximum volume of 30 decimals. The sound quality isn't bad. It is a crisp, clear, sound of music that transmit from the speaker. But I like my music to pump up a little louder than this speaker will allow. Overall, I'm pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Okay, for a small room.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I hate about this is the volume control works more for like to skip a track not for what its meant to be. This works better is you have 2 going at the same time. Another things is that if you have multiple ones and in different rooms they will all play your music like 5 second delayed which also suck! They don't play at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Nt84

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor/gift item
customer_reviews.text: We used to have an outdoor speaker but it lost its life to the kids' watergun fights, so we saw this and purchased it as a gift. We decided to try it out and make sure it was worth the money we paid and would make a good gift - well, it hasn't left our porch. Needless to say, we never gave it as a gift. We use it for all our evening/outdoor meals. Sounds is quite decent for our small yard and it pairs well with droid and iPhones. It's easy to use anywhere and the flickering lights give a nice ambience for romantic dinners. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PaulineLovesBacon

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The flame effect is really a joke. I got this mainly as a Bluetooth speaker for poolside and for the deck area, and it does decently for that. The flame is just basically square leds behind a matte plastic screen and you can just about make them all out. There are no volume controls on it though...the + & a actually skip tracks or go back and are not volume.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome the first time we used it, pretty loud could hear it through the whole back yard. Used it again for another backyard bbq and we could barely hear out of it. Not sure what happened, we had the volume all the way up on the speaker and our iPad. It’s perfect if you’re sitting around a camp fire or a table but it’s definitely not loud enough to use for a party setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Order

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and even better look.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Ready to go right out the box. I got two for an anniversary present for my hubby. He loved them and they give off decent light. Take the time to fully charge them. We were excited at how great they were and didn’t charge them before first use. After that no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, nice effect
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested the battery life to see how long the speaker will last, but the sound quality comes out just fine and the fire lighting effect is rather pleasant for mood lighting. Looking directly at the light doesn't look like fire at all, but the casted shadows along distant walls suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Doesn't Know

customer_reviews.title: Strong and provides good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ambiance this speaker makes and it works well too. I was working on my car and was in the garage with the speaker in the car in the driveway and I could still hear the music. So could my neighbor! Haha, he came over to get the name of the song. It is handy and strong. My daughter dropped it off the kitchen counter and it did not break! That's a win!!
customer_reviews.author: oh*mommyme

customer_reviews.title: Great light effect, average speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are average-sounding. They play best when playing soft music. Loud rock or metal music doesn’t sound too good. The flickering light is super believable though!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little speaker. BIG sound in a small package. I was extremely impressed with the sound quality. Bought this speaker for my patio and wow... may get another one for inside. The candlelight feature is awesome. Gives off a nice glow. Only thing I do not like is the volume control isn’t perfect. I went to turn the music down and it went back to the previous song. So I control the sound with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality audio
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool design, seems really fun. But then you get it and the audio quality is very low. My cell phone is now a louder and much higher quality speaker than this. The flame effect is nifty, but not particularly convincing. I'm sure there's some folks who'd love this thing, but for me it's cheap and rather useless.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband - to say he is music obsessed is putting it mildly!!! I bought this so he can either use to listen to this spring when he works outside in the yard or in the summer when we use the fire pit. He is absolutely crazy about this thing!! Right now he uses it in the house- the sound quality is great and it is so pretty to look at!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Satagaj

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The lighting effect is really cool. Can also just turn on the candle effect if not listening to music. The sound quality is really good! I bought one for myself, liked it so much, bought two more for Christmas presents. Not sure why they also sell a tripod for this, unless maybe it’s outside on the ground? Really not necessary. This was a great purchase and would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Borneman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ambience creator with soft light and vibrant music.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The construction is solid the function is great. The light is soft and nice. The music is clear and rich quality. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice around a patio.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker wil not wow you. It's a great asset to a comfortable evening around our patio table. The controls are flawless. The flame light is simply beautiful. Mesmerizing to say the least. I would say that the acoustics are quite good. Solid bass and decent treble. Its as described. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Goose184

customer_reviews.title: Great Ambiance and Impressed by the Sound
customer_reviews.text: Much better sound quality out of this thing than I expected! The sound doesn't get distorted when it's played relatively high. The ambiance from the light is great too and you can easily turn the light on or off with just an easy push of a button. Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Candid Tech TV

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is not super loud but it's nice for a patio table. The sound is decent and the flickering flame is a really nice touch. This also has a tripod style screw hole on the bottom of it so you could mount it somewhere. This would look cool on a bamboo pole to give a torch effect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kemph

customer_reviews.title: Not a realistic flame !!!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sound is ok the unit itself is well built ... The flame is awful it doesn't look natural, all it is a a bunch of little round LEDs blinking randomly it doesn't look real unless u stand 50 Ft away I purchased it because of the 1500 mostly good reviews and it was a lightning deal for 33 $ don't go by the video of the flame it's photo shopped take my word for it . I will not return it because it's to much trouble . with all due respect I almost believe the reviewers need glasses. THE FLAME IS NOT REALISTIC !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For Dad
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for his birthday in October. He loves to listen to music while on the boat, fishing, working in the garage, etc. I liked the look of this as it reminds me of the wrought iron on some of the railings in his home. As soon as I gave it to him he loved it. It is much louder than I anticipated and does not sound as "tin"y as I had expected. Great buy for the price! Highly recommend. He now travels with it everywhere- I may have to get him a few more so he can leave them: in his car, in the boat, in his study, in the garage, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected to bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this speaker...got a pole for it and had it in a perfect spot in the yard to hear from all sides. HOWEVER, the speaker loses it's bluetooth connection every few minutes, then reconnects...so frustrating! I'm returning for another model.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: I gave a previous bad review I would like to retract!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Originally had some issues with it, but it turned out to be a combination of phone settings and my lack of know-how when it comes to smartphone technology. I now find myself using this speaker all the time...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crocker

customer_reviews.title: It has some bass
customer_reviews.text: I was Surprised that this speaker had some bass. The sound quality is good and it goes pretty loud for indoor use. The candle flame effect it pretty good I think my kids will have fun with this a Christmas time. As far as the batter life well it’s still going so I would say it’s good. Connecting it with Bluetooth was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: It’s sucked BIG TIME
customer_reviews.text: If I can give this product 0 stars for quality of sound bass battery life and volume I would. It did not impress me one bit, this product is the quality of those 5-10 dollar music boxes they sell in street corners, and even those probably sound louder. The lamp is not even useful as it flashes 🙄 not stays turned on as expected. They try to promote this as a patio get together outings with friends , but in reality if people have NORMAL voice conversations they wouldn’t be able to hear the music. Possibly best for alone bathroom bath time or something, but make sure you don’t fart, You’ll be competing with the music box 😂
customer_reviews.author: BlowPopMe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound, Easy to Use, Gorgeous Flame Effect!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly surprised by how much I enjoyed this product. I thought it may be a gimmicky Bluetooth speaker with a faux flame effect but I was totally wrong! It is VERY easy to use, has terrific sound quality (including some nice low end bass) excellent battery life. As a bonus to all of that the flame light effect really looks good. It sets the mood for sure! One last thing of note is that it attaches to tripods so you can take it into the backyard for BBQ or parties etc. All around a GREAT product! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Travis Meeks

customer_reviews.title: I really like this column.  I will also order for a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a column to take with me on vacation. Now I found her, she not only plays well, but also glows. Creates a romantic mood. The sound is very high quality and looks like a candle. It turns out to be a great candlelight evening.
customer_reviews.author: Veranika

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised on how good this speaker sounds! Charge time and light time is as stated. Shipping was perfect I have Prime so it arrived in two days. Speaker comes with a year warranty! It also has a tripod that you can purchase to mount it on! I’m using it for my nail area at home perfect because that’s my relaxation area! I highly suggest!
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Nails by Nay

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked just as it was supposed to. In the last 2 months, I've used it about 10 times. Last night, the sound started cutting out. It was fully charged and it wasn't my phone because I paired it with another speaker and it worked fine. So bottom line is the Bluetooth connection has just failed. Now I'm stuck with a $40 flickering light. Next time I'll do some research before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, a little pricey for not including the stand
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about this product yet, just got it. The sound is a little over rated. Lots of difficulty getting it to pair with devices. Lastly, there is a stand for this but it is not listed at the bottom, where it says, customers who bought this also bought... Not sure how much the stand is but I think this blue tooth and tiki light is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Bass does NOT live up to the hype. It will not sync to any Bluetooth - it will not sync to Alexa devices. The other outdoor speakers I ordered are awesome! Soundcore and Oontz Angle 3. Both were cost less than this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Bitchin Flame/BlueTooth
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this was to get to play music and watch the candle. The only drawback is that it doesn't sync to the song, it just randomly flickers, which is still pretty, just something I wish it would do. Oh and the sound is great for a speaker this size!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Krol

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker and the lights are so beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this speaker!!! Very easy to set up and connect to your device. The lighting is beautiful and relaxing! I’m not sure how I’ve went this long without one!! The speaker has great clarity and volume control as well!!! Can’t wait to take it camping with us!
customer_reviews.author: Tisha V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Blown away by this small Bluetooth LED Flame Speaker! It’s just the right size, looks great in any room and sound quality is way better than I had expected it to be. I can’t wait to use this outside and might just have to get a second one!
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and clarity good and loud. And I love the flame💙🧡
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing❤ got it for being out our new deck. in my video you can hear it's really loud that's at its loudest going to get another one and my son is getting 1 to he liked it. I would Highly recommend😉
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne kamish

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! The look of the flames are a little less realistic than I was expecting. The sting of lights on the inside, are really noticeable. That being said, it would be cool if there was a variety of colors the flames could be changed to! The only thing that would make this product much better, would be the ability to charge the product, while in use. The instructions discourage doing so. Anyway... I do enjoy using this speaker, everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: My best Amazon purchase thus far!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed and satisfied with this purchase! The look is awesome and the sound quality is great, a very clear quality sound (and sounds even better indoors).
customer_reviews.author: Winfred Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to reviews from other people, I was able to sync both speakers to my phone. It is definitely possible! Took me about 5 minutes and both speakers are playing the music. UPDATE: Used to use at a party this weekend in the middle of a heat wave. The battery life is amazing. I turned them on around 2:45pm and they were still going strong past 10pm. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Boymomx2

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift & loved it so much I’m buying myself one!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. I bought for my dad as a birthday gift and now I want one myself! The pictures do no justice for how beautiful it is with the lights looking like a fireplace. The sound is so clear and it’s simple to use. Even if you don’t play music it’s just beautiful for ambiance! It’s absolutely worth buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking and the led light flickers. Charges quickly. I rated an overall 4 because the column control and "next" song button are the same. Quick click for switching songs and a long click to adjust column. Most of the time it skips to the next song when I hold for volumn. (Could be me fathumbing) Last, I've yet to get a superb bass out of a portable speaker yet but this bass is pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, perfect for a little light and background music
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and I'm currently trying it out so I can't comment on the battery life. The sound is perfect for what we need so we are very happy with it. I really like how the lights flicker, it's very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Faerie-bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out an looses wifi connection.
customer_reviews.text: Kept losing wifi and buffering my phone. My daughter has another brand. We tested it and it works well. I already had one replace to see of it was defective. Same story. Sending this one back as well.
customer_reviews.author: William Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these on Amazon marketplace. I had to return them, because only one of them charged. I reordered brand new ones. I love them. The music, the candle effects, and the design. They're perfect. I wish I could hook 4 of them up at once. If I could I would buy two more.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination of flame and music
customer_reviews.text: An interesting product that combines both flame and music. Looks very realistic and makes a nice decoration. Speaker is small, but decent quality for the price. Charges with a USB cord. Very portable. Use it for romantic evenings, camping, parties, Halloween, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DarkStoneCastle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and was actually more fun than I expected. It catches everyone’s attention with the flickering flame. It could be a little louder but it is fine and provides nice background music for conversations on the deck. I am tempted to buy another as I think they may play off of each other for stereo sound. Need to research this a little more. Happy with product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W
